title: Was It Always Tom Brady?
description:
Charly and Elle bond over the terrible performances from their NFL teams before getting into which QB's had the best games. Then, they question if Tom Brady was the glue that held New England together before wrapping up with a little celebrity gossip!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
